snippet: Stock indexes on Wall Street slipped on losses in technology shares and the stalemate in fiscal negotiations.
abstract: Stocks fall as another decline in Apple takes a toll and investors unload some shares due to uncertainty surrounding the budget negotiations in Washington.
lead_paragraph: Stock indexes on Wall Street slipped on losses in technology shares and the stalemate in fiscal negotiations.

headline.main: Shares Continue to Slide, Awaiting a Budget Accord
headline.print_headline: Shares Continue to Slide, Awaiting a Budget Accord
